attributes.action: STOP SEX OFFENDERS LIVING IN THE SAME AREA AS CHILD VICTIMS AND ADULT VICTIMS TOO!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am a victim of sexual child abuse and still have to come face to face on a regular basis with the offender , this should not be allowed to happen. It should be a condition that goes with being put on the sex offenders register. People say we should move BUT WHY i have done nothing wrong and should not be ashamed and hide away. please help us to show me and other victims that we can feel safe and that we dont have to constantly bump into these people that have already taken so many years of our life away .
